subpods.title: Best motion picture

img.alt:
winner | Anora (produced by Alex Coco, Samantha Leigh Quan and Sean Baker)
nominees | A Complete Unknown (produced by Fred Berger, James Mangold and Alex Heineman)
 | Conclave (produced by Tessa Ross, Juliette Howell and Michael Jackman)
 | Dune: Part Two (produced by Mary Parent, Cale Boyter, Tanya Lapointe and Denis Villeneuve)
 | Emilia Pérez (produced by Pascal Caucheteux and Jacques Audiard)
 | I'm Still Here (produced by Maria Carlota Bruno and Rodrigo Teixeira)
 | Nickel Boys (produced by Dede Gardner, Jeremy Kleiner and Joslyn Barnes)
 | The Brutalist (produced by Brady Corbet, D.J. Gugenheim, Brian Young, Andrew Morrison and Nick Gordon)
 | The Substance (produced by Coralie Fargeat, Tim Bevan and Eric Fellner)
 | Wicked (produced by Marc E. Platt)
